name: Monsta Ga Kuru!
description:
An experiment hamster appears! Little cute innocents have no knowledge about that! So they need your help!

GAMEPLAY VIDEO: 

Instructions:

Drag and drop innocents before the timer expires. 

DO NOT FORGET: You can't move again when you dropped it.

Can be added more puzzles on newer levels. 

Asset's That I used: 

SFX: MadRooster Sound Library 2021 Sound Pack

GUI:  Freepik

Jigsaw:  Free Platformer Asset

Explosion Effect by Unity Store
